languages.text: "Ах, Лорд-капитан, это место кишит безобразными пятнами блеклых красок! От них у меня кружится голова..." {n}Кассия прикрывает глаза плотной шалью.{/n} "Дворец Адептус Администратум оказался столь же унылым местом, сколь и письменные труды его служителей".

traits.locale_text: "Ах, Лорд-капитан, это место кишит безобразными пятнами блеклых красок! От них у меня кружится голова..." {n}Кассия прикрывает глаза плотной шалью.{/n} "Дворец Адептус Администратум оказался столь же унылым местом, сколь и письменные труды его служителей".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Oh, Lord Captain, this place teems with hideous stains of washed-out colours! It makes my head spin..." {n}Cassia covers her eyes with a thick shawl.{/n} "The Palace of the Adeptus Administratum has proved to be just as depressing as the published works of its servants."
languages.original_text: "Ах, Лорд-капитан, это место кишит безобразными пятнами блеклых красок! От них у меня кружится голова..." {n}Кассия прикрывает глаза плотной шалью.{/n} "Дворец Адептус Администратум оказался столь же унылым местом, сколь и письменные труды его служителей".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, Lord Captain, this place teems with hideous stains of washed-out colours! It makes my head spin..." {n}Cassia covers her eyes with a thick shawl.{/n} "The Palace of the Adeptus Administratum has proved to be just as depressing as the published works of its servants."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh, Lord Captain, this place teems with hideous stains of washed-out colours! It makes my head spin..." {n}Cassia covers her eyes with a thick shawl.{/n} "The Palace of the Adeptus Administratum has proved to be just as depressing as the published works of its servants."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh, Lord Captain, this place teems with hideous stains of washed-out colours! It makes my head spin..." {n}Cassia covers her eyes with a thick shawl.{/n} "The Palace of the Adeptus Administratum has proved to be just as depressing as the published works of its servants."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh, Lord Captain, this place teems with hideous stains of washed-out colours! It makes my head spin..." {n}Cassia covers her eyes with a thick shawl.{/n} "The Palace of the Adeptus Administratum has proved to be just as depressing as the published works of its servants."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “噢，舰长大人，这个地方充斥着褪了色的丑陋污点！我感到头晕目眩……”{n}卡西娅用厚厚的披肩遮住了双眼。{/n}“事实证明，帝国内政部的殿堂就像那些仆人写出来的作品一样，令人失望不已。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, Lord Captain, this place teems with hideous stains of washed-out colours! It makes my head spin..." {n}Cassia covers her eyes with a thick shawl.{/n} "The Palace of the Adeptus Administratum has proved to be just as depressing as the published works of its servants."

traits.locale_text: “噢，舰长大人，这个地方充斥着褪了色的丑陋污点！我感到头晕目眩……”{n}卡西娅用厚厚的披肩遮住了双眼。{/n}“事实证明，帝国内政部的殿堂就像那些仆人写出来的作品一样，令人失望不已。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¡Oh, Lord Capitán, este lugar está lleno de manchas horribles de colores apagados! Hace que me dé vueltas la cabeza...». {n}Cassia se tapa los ojos con un grueso chal.{/n} «El palacio del Adeptus Administratum ha demostrado ser tan deprimente como las obras que publican sus sirvientes».
languages.original_text: "Oh, Lord Captain, this place teems with hideous stains of washed-out colours! It makes my head spin..." {n}Cassia covers her eyes with a thick shawl.{/n} "The Palace of the Adeptus Administratum has proved to be just as depressing as the published works of its servants."

traits.locale_text: «¡Oh, Lord Capitán, este lugar está lleno de manchas horribles de colores apagados! Hace que me dé vueltas la cabeza...». {n}Cassia se tapa los ojos con un grueso chal.{/n} «El palacio del Adeptus Administratum ha demostrado ser tan deprimente como las obras que publican sus sirvientes».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「まあ、ロード・キャプテン、この場所はひどい汚れを落としたような色に満ちているではないですか！目まいがいたします…」{n}カシアは厚手のショールで目を覆う。{/n}「帝国行政局の宮殿は、その職員が発行する書類並に気が滅入るものなのですね」
languages.original_text: "Oh, Lord Captain, this place teems with hideous stains of washed-out colours! It makes my head spin..." {n}Cassia covers her eyes with a thick shawl.{/n} "The Palace of the Adeptus Administratum has proved to be just as depressing as the published works of its servants."

traits.locale_text: 「まあ、ロード・キャプテン、この場所はひどい汚れを落としたような色に満ちているではないですか！目まいがいたします…」{n}カシアは厚手のショールで目を覆う。{/n}「帝国行政局の宮殿は、その職員が発行する書類並に気が滅入るものなのですね」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Oh, {mf|seigneur|seigneure}-capitaine, cet endroit est rempli de taches aux couleurs défraîchies ! C'est tellement répugnant que j'en ai le tournis, {n}dit Cassia en se couvrant les yeux d'un châle épais.{/n} En fin de compte, le palais de l'Adeptus Administratum est aussi déprimant que les ouvrages publiés par les fonctionnaires qui y travaillent. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, Lord Captain, this place teems with hideous stains of washed-out colours! It makes my head spin..." {n}Cassia covers her eyes with a thick shawl.{/n} "The Palace of the Adeptus Administratum has proved to be just as depressing as the published works of its servants."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, {mf|seigneur|seigneure}-capitaine, cet endroit est rempli de taches aux couleurs défraîchies ! C'est tellement répugnant que j'en ai le tournis, {n}dit Cassia en se couvrant les yeux d'un châle épais.{/n} En fin de compte, le palais de l'Adeptus Administratum est aussi déprimant que les ouvrages publiés par les fonctionnaires qui y travaillent. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Oh, Lord Captain, dieser Ort wimmelt vor hässlichen Flecken in ausgewaschenen Farben! In meinem Kopf dreht sich alles ..." {n}Cassia bedeckt ihre Augen mit einem dicken Tuch.{/n} "Der Palast des Adeptus Administratum ist ebenso deprimierend wie die veröffentlichen Werke seiner Diener."
languages.original_text: "Oh, Lord Captain, this place teems with hideous stains of washed-out colours! It makes my head spin..." {n}Cassia covers her eyes with a thick shawl.{/n} "The Palace of the Adeptus Administratum has proved to be just as depressing as the published works of its servants."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, Lord Captain, dieser Ort wimmelt vor hässlichen Flecken in ausgewaschenen Farben! In meinem Kopf dreht sich alles ..." {n}Cassia bedeckt ihre Augen mit einem dicken Tuch.{/n} "Der Palast des Adeptus Administratum ist ebenso deprimierend wie die veröffentlichen Werke seiner Diener."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, burası solmuş renklerin iğrenç lekeleriyle dolu! Kafam allak bullak oluyor..." {n}Cassia, kalın bir eşarpla gözlerini kapatıyor.{/n} "Adeptus Administratum Sarayı da hizmetkârlarının yayımlanmış eserleri kadar iç karartıcıymış meğer."
languages.original_text: "Oh, Lord Captain, this place teems with hideous stains of washed-out colours! It makes my head spin..." {n}Cassia covers her eyes with a thick shawl.{/n} "The Palace of the Adeptus Administratum has proved to be just as depressing as the published works of its servants."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, burası solmuş renklerin iğrenç lekeleriyle dolu! Kafam allak bullak oluyor..." {n}Cassia, kalın bir eşarpla gözlerini kapatıyor.{/n} "Adeptus Administratum Sarayı da hizmetkârlarının yayımlanmış eserleri kadar iç karartıcıymış meğer."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
